channel.title: how to increase range
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "how to increase range"

item.title: Re: how to increase range
item.content:encoded:
Becoming a Jonin increases your Special Jonin bonus to all three attributes.

Dark Draft increases range on your next mission by +5.

You can always try praying to McMasters. It won't work, but you can try.

item.title: Re: how to increase range
item.content:encoded:
there are some ways.
1) some jutsus provides a range bonus
2) permanents items like ninja dog (only nin range), duellists eye, letter of marque â€¦
3) some allies provide a range-bonus
4) certain teams give you also additional range

item.title: how to increase range
item.content:encoded: how do i increase my range in all three areas? some missions (regular or special) are impossible to win without a higher ranger. any idea of what i can do? thanks
